com.edugility.jaxb
Class JAXBElementScanner

java.lang.Object
  com.edugility.jaxb.JAXBElementScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class JAXBElementScanner
extends Object
implements Serializable

A class that efficiently scans class bytecode looking for classes annotated with JAXB annotations that optionally implement a given interface.

See Also:
scan(), XmlAdapterBytecodeGenerator, PackageInfoModifier, Serialized Form

scan

public Map<String,String> scan()
                        throws IOException
Returns a Map of JAXB-annotated implementation class names indexed by the interface names they implement.

The default implementation of this method does no classloading but scans the bytecode directly.

Returns:
a non-null Map of names of JAXB-annotated classes indexed by the names of interfaces they implement
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs during the processing of class files
